title: Create CLI Tool Architecture with Plugin System
task: Design a modular CLI tool architecture that supports plugins, commands, and extensions. The tool should handle command registration, plugin discovery, dependency management, configuration management, and provide a clean developer experience. Include plugin lifecycle management, sandboxing, and version compatibility.
context: This CLI tool will be used internally by the development team to automate common workflows, manage deployments, and provide standardized interfaces to various services. It needs to be extensible, maintainable, and secure.
